name: Dicey Chess
description:
Our entry to the GMTK game jam of 2022 is "Dicey Chess". This game is made by us, two brothers, and it's our second participation in agame jam.

Story

The younlings of dice town have been kidnapped by the evil chess set. It's your task to save them accompanied by five 6-sided dice.

The elder dice awaits your return.

Gameplay

Using a Yathzee style combat you will face off against the army of chess pieces. By rolling the right number, you can attack, defend or heal. Making combo's, like doubles, triples and 3-in-a-row, you can preform special moves. Find the weakness of your enemy and save the younglings of dice town.
